name: Deadly_Cut
display_help: You perform a quick slash with your death infused weapon, causing negative energy and cold damage while also reducing the target's chance to hit.

name: Deadly_Bolt
display_help: You launch a blast of death energy at a target, causing cold and negative energy damage. The target also suffers reduced movement and attack speeds.

name: Deadly_Blast
display_help: You fire a powerful blast of death energy at a single target, causing cold and negative energy damage. The target also suffers a reduced chance to hit.

name: Deadly_Hack
display_help: You perform a forceful hack with your death infused weapon, causing negative energy and cold damage while also reducing the target's movement and attack speeds.

name: Deadly_Circle
display_help: You slash at multiple targets around you with your death infused weapon, striking them for negative energy and cold damage. Affected targets also suffer a reduction in their defenses.
display_short_help: Melee (Targeted AoE), High DMG (Negative Energy/Cold), -DEF (Foe, All)

name: Terrifying_Stare
display_help: You gaze instills terror in your enemies, causing them fear and reducing their chance to hit.

name: Boon_of_Death
display_help: You channel death energy through yourself to a targeted foe. Boon of Death drains life energy from the target and slowly transfers it to you and all nearby allies. The targeted foe suffers cold damage and a reduction in their damage potential, while you and your nearby allies are healed.

name: Deaths_Embrace
display_help: You focus death energy on a single target, chilling the air so massively that the target is caught in a block of ice. The affected foe suffers cold damage and negative energy damage over time. The target also suffers reductions in their movement and attack speeds.
display_short_help: Ranged, Superior DMG(Cold), Moderate DMG (Negative Energy, DoT), Hold (Foe), -Speed (Foe, All), -Rech (Foe)

name: Dark_Blast
display_help: You fire concentrated negative energy at a single target. The target suffers negative energy damage and a reduced chance to hit.

name: Night_Fall
display_help: You fire a cone shaped burst of negative energy, striking all foes within range for negative energy damage. Affected foes also suffer a reduced chance to hit.

name: Moonbeam
display_help: You fire a very powerful burst of negative energy at a target, causing negative energy damage and reducing their chance to hit.

name: Dark_Grasp
display_help: You cause your target's shadow to wholly envelop them, leaving them held and rendered helpless while suffering negative energy damage. The target will also suffer a reduced chance to hit.

name: Resistance
display_help: Souls are resistant to Sleep, Fear, Immobilize and Slow. They are also resistant to Smashing, Lethal, Cold, Negative, and Toxic damage.
display_short_help: Self (Auto), +RES(Sleep, Fear, Immobilize, Slow, Smashing, Lethal, Cold, Negative, Toxic)

name: Self_Destruct
display_help: You are only able to remain material for a few minutes before your soul permanently expires.

name: Ghastly_Blast
display_help: You unleash a blast of pure necromantic energy at a target, causing negative energy damage and reducing their chance to hit.

name: Resistance
display_help: Grave Knights are resistant to Sleep, Fear, Slow and Disorient. They are also resistant to Cold, Negative Energy, Toxic and Psionic damage.
display_short_help: Self (Auto) +RES(Sleep, Fear, Disorient, Slow, Cold, Negative, Toxic, Psionic)

name: Super_Leap
display_help: You are capable of Super Leap.

name: Hack
display_help: You perform a hacking strike that causes lethal damage and reduces the target's defenses.

name: Slash
display_help: You perform a quick slash that causes lethal damage and reduces the target's defenses.

name: Resistance
display_help: The Lich is resistant to Sleep and Fear. It is also resistant to Negative Energy, Toxic and Cold damage.

name: Dark_Blast
display_help: You fire concentrated negative energy at a single target. The target suffers negative energy damage and a reduced chance to hit.

name: Torrent
display_help: The Torrent has reduced your chance to hit.

name: Super_Leap
display_help: You are capable of Super Leap.

name: Shadow_Punch
display_help: You charge up your fists with negative energy before punching a nearby foe. The target suffers negative energy and smashing damage, as well as a reduced chance to hit.

name: Smite
display_help: You charge up your fists with negative energy and unleash a powerful attack on a nearby foe. The target suffers negative energy and smashing damage, as well as a reduced chance to hit.

name: Dark_Blast
display_help: You fire concentrated negative energy at a single target. The target suffers negative energy damage and a reduced chance to hit.

name: Shadow_Maul
display_help: You wrap your arms with negative energy before striking out with a series of blows that deal smashing and negative energy damage to nearby targets in front of you. These blows also cloud your target's vision, lowering their chance to hit.

name: Dark_Regeneration
display_help: You channel negative energy into your target in order to drain a small amount of life from all enemies nearby, healing yourself with the drained essence. The more foes affected, the more you will be healed.

name: Placate
display_help: You trick a foe into dropping their attack focus on you. When successful, you will also be hidden for a short time.

name: Aura_of_Fear
display_help: You wrap yourself in a nightmarish aura of fear. Foes close to you are treated to visions most horrific, forcing them to tremble in terror, only attacking if attacked, and even then, with a reduced chance to hit.

name: Midnight_Grasp
display_help: You form negative energy into dark tentacles that can immobilize a foe, reducing their chance to hit and continuously drain their life force in the form of negative energy damage.

name: Shadow_Punch
display_help: Your Accuracy has been reduced by the Shadow Punch.

name: Smite
display_help: Your Accuracy has been reduced by the Smite attack.

name: Soul_Drain
display_help: Using this power, you can drain the essence of all nearby foes' souls, thus increasing your own strength. Each affected foe will lose some Hit Points and add to your Damage and Accuracy. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long

name: Siphon_Life
display_help: You've been affected by a Siphon Life attack. Your Accuracy is reduced.

name: Gloom
display_help: The Gloom is slowly draining your life and reducing your Accuracy.

name: Dark_Blast
display_help: Your Accuracy has been reduced by the Dark Blast.

name: Brawl
display_help: When all else fails, use your own 2 fists.

name: Resistance
display_help: Skulls are resistant to negative energy damage, but vulnerable to energy damage.

name: Resistance_AV
display_help: The most powerful leaders of the Skulls retain their resistance to negative energy damage, but are no longer vulnerable to energy damage.

name: Burst
display_help: You quickly fire a burst of rounds at a single target. The target suffers lethal damage over time and reduced defenses.

name: Slug
display_help: You fire a single slug at a targeted foe, causing lethal damage and potentially knocking the target down.Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG (Lethal), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

name: Automatic_Fire
display_help: You fire a fully automatic burst at a target, striking multiple foes if they are caught in the burst's cone. Affected targets suffer lethal damage over time.

name: Shotgun
display_help: Good at close range. Fires a cone of buckshot pellets and can knock some foes down.

name: Submachine_Gun
display_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Submachine Gun.

name: Fireman_Axe
display_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Fireman Axe.

name: Baseball_Bat
display_help: There is nothing like slugging someone in the head with this baseball bat.

name: Knife
display_help: Basic stabbing and cutting blade.

name: Revolver
display_help: Small caliber side arm. Not very accurate.

name: Sledgehammer
display_help: This heavy, but unwieldy and slow Sledgehammer can knock down foes.

name: Pistols
display_help: You fire a single round from one of your pistols, causing lethal damage to your target.

name: Dual_Shot
display_help: Fires both pistols at once at a time target. Firing both pistols at once is slower than a single shot, but deals more damage, and the target may get knocked down by the force of the impact. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Submachine_Gun
display_help: You fire your submachine gun at a single target, causing lethal damage over time and reducing the target's defenses.

name: Focused_Burst
display_help: You fire a focused burst from your submachine gun, causing lethal damage over time and potentially knocking the target down.
display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DoT (Lethal), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

name: Grave_Knight
display_help: You summon a Grave Knight to assist you in battle.

name: Shadow_Punch
display_help: You charge up your fists with negative energy before punching a nearby foe. The target suffers negative energy and smashing damage, as well as a reduced chance to hit.

name: Dark_Blast
display_help: You fire concentrated negative energy at a single target. The target suffers negative energy damage and a reduced chance to hit.

name: Gloom
display_help: The Gloom is slowly draining your life and reducing your Accuracy.

name: Smite
display_help: You charge up your fists with negative energy and unleash a powerful attack on a nearby foe. The target suffers negative energy and smashing damage, as well as a reduced chance to hit.

name: Siphon_Life
display_help: You siphon the life out of a target, causing negative energy damage and healing yourself. The affected target also suffers a reduced chance to hit.

name: Soul_Extraction
display_help: You can extract the soul, creating a ghost to aid you in battle.

name: Soul_Drain
display_help: You drain the essence of all nearby foes' souls, thus increasing your own strength. Each affected foe will lose some Hit Points and add to your damage potential and chance to hit.

name: Lich
display_help: You summon a Lich to assist you in battle.
